translations.translation: Is it you who make it germinate or are We the Germinator?
Do you give it its increase, or are We the giver?
Is it you or We Who make them grow?
Do you make it grow or is it We who make it grow?
Is it you who cultivate it, or is it We Who develop it?
Is it you that make it grow, or are We the Grower
Is it you that cause it to grow, or are We the causers of growth?
Do you yourselves sow it, or are We the Sowers?
Is it ye who foster it, or are We the Fosterer?
Is it you who cause them to grow or do We?
Cause it ye to grow, or are We the Grower?
Is it you who make it grow, or are We the grower?
Is it ye that cause it to grow, or are We the Cause?
Is it you that make it grow, or are We the Grower?
is it you that sow it, or are We the Sower?
Is it you who make it grow, or are We the Grower?
Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?
[56:64] Is it you who make it grow, or are We the Grower?
(Is it ye) people of Mecca (who foster it) who makes it grow, (or are We the Fosterer) or are We the One to make it grow?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { ءَأَنتُمْ تَزْرَعُونَهُ } وتنبتونه { أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلزَّارِعُونَ } [الواقعة: 64] المقصورون على الإنبات بالاستقلال والاختيار بلا مشاركة ومظاهرة

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
ولمّا ذكّرهم بنعمة الإيجاد، ذكّرهم بنعمة الإمداد، فقال: { أفرأيتم ما تحرثون } أي: ما تبذرون حبه وتقلِبون الأرض عليه، { أأنتم تزرعونه } أن: تُنبتونه وتُخرجونه من الأرض نباتاً { أم نحن الزارعون } المُنبِتون له؟ وفي الحديث:



 " لا يقل أحدكم، زرعت، وليقل: حرثت "
